title: Tesla Vs Tesla: HC orders mediation in trademark dispute between Musk's firm & Gurugram-based company
description: The Delhi High Court has directed Tesla Inc. and Gurugram-based Tesla Power India to mediate their trademark dispute. Tesla Inc. alleges that Tesla Power India's use of the "Tesla" trademark infringes on its rights, causing consumer confusion and harming its business. Mediation is scheduled for July 18, with a further hearing on September 18.
